articles.title: Iran-Iraq earthquake is deadliest of 2017
articles.description: At least 402 people have died after the deadliest earthquake of 2017 struck the border region between Iraq and Iran late Sunday.

articles.description: Hundreds of people are dead and thousands are injured after a powerful 7.3 magnitude earthquake struck the border region between Iran and Iraq.

articles.title: Earthquake rocks border between Iraq, Iran

articles.title: Earthquake aftershocks shake Iraq-Iran border - CNN Video
articles.description: A 7.3 magnitude earthquake along the Iraq-Iran border has killed dozens, and there have been at least two aftershocks.  CNN's Amara Walker and Julie Martin have the latest.

articles.title: Texas church turned into a memorial after mass shooting
articles.description: The same day that the First Baptist Church of Sutherland Springs held its first service since a gunman opened fire on its parishioners last week and killed 25 people and an unborn child, residents and visitors got to see how the church had been turned into a memorial.
